DOC.brief_summary: This lifestyle intervention plan improve healthy lifestyle practice ( diet , exercise , smoke cessation ) among stroke survivor result reduction measure general abdominal obesity .
DOC.brief_title: HEALS ( Healthy Eating And Lifestyle After Stroke )
DOC.detailed_description: Study data collection consist baseline outcome study visit . Each visit consist survey physical exam collect height , weight body measurement . Outcome measure include : 1 . Physical Activity : Collected via survey use version International Physical Activity Questionnaire 2 . Diet : Collected via survey use Brief Dietary Assessment Tools Hispanics 3 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) : Collected via physical exam follow Alaska State Department Health Social Services BMI Guidelines 4 . Abdominal Obesity : Collected via physical exam follow NIH Standard Circumference method .
DOC.criteria: Phase I : Completed 12 month SUSTAIN trial ( SUSTAIN criterion : age ≥ 40 year , acute TIA ischemic stroke within prior one month systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) > 120 mm Hg ) . Phase II : Stroke TIA > 3 month prior screen date , age > 20 year , blood pressure ( SBP ) > 120 mm Hg . Phase I Phase II : Same SUSTAIN criterion : medical condition limit participation follow assessment , severe cognitive impairment ( MMSE ≤24 ) , severe global disability ( modify Rankin ≥3 ) .
